content: row next round knit 3 place marker knit around thumb gusset round 1 k1fb knit to one before marker k1fb slip marker knit around the round round 2 knit around repeat these two row until there are 11 15 17 stitches on the first needle before the marker knit across these 11 15 17 stitches and slip them onto a stitch holder these will make the thumb and will be worked later hand knit around mitten back to where you put the stitches on the holder cast on 0 1 2 stitches to ensure that the stitch count is now 24 34 44 continue working in the round until the mitten is just longer than the pinky finger © 2020 mawdsleyfibrearts top decrease arrange the stitches so that they are split in half that is the stitches that will make up the front of the mitten are on 1-2 needles and the stitches that make up the back of the mitten are on 1-2 needles this will ensure that your top decreases will line up with the thumb round 1 k1 ssk k 6 11 16 k2tog k1 k1 ssk work to 3 before end of row k2tog k1 round 2 knit around round 3 k1 ssk k 4 9 14 k2tog k1 k1 ssk work to 3 before end k2tog k1 round 4 knit around round 5 k1 ssk k 2 7 12 k2tog k1 k1 ssk work to 3 before end k2tog k1 if you are knitting the first size proceed to the top seaming section the other two sizes have a few more decreases to do round 6 k1 ssk k - 5 10 k2tog k1 k1 ssk work to 3 before end k2tog k1 round 7 k1 ssk k 0 3 8 k2tog k1 k1 ssk work to 3 before end k2tog k1 if you are knitting the second size proceed to the top seaming section round 8 k1 ssk k - - 6 k2tog k1 k1 ssk work to 3 before end k2tog k1 round 9 k1 ssk k - - 4 k2tog k1 k1 ssk work to 3 before end k2tog k1 top seaming the front and the back of the mitten now need to be joined leaving about 12 inches of yarn attached to the mitten cut the yarn there are options in how to seam the mitten one option is to use a tapestry needle and close the stitches together another option shown here is to turn the mitten inside out and do a three-needle bind off to do this put all front stitches on a stitch holder and put all back stitches on another stitch holder turn mitten inside out put front © 2020 mawdsleyfibrearts stitches on one needle and the back stitches on another needle starting from the side of where the yarn is attached to the mitten take a third needle k2tog by taking a stitch from each needle and bind off as you go thumb place 11 15
